title: My Mom Got A Contract Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Child Protagonist   Childcare   Contracts   Cute Protagonist   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Marriage   Nobles   Royalty   Second Chance
author: Siya   시야
description:
Lilyca was a girl from the slums who lived with her drunk mother. 

And then one day…

“No, it’s hot! No!”

Her mother woke up screaming,

“Lily, you’re alive! Are you younger?”

She was talking nonsense.

“What date is it today?”

She must have lost her mind.

“Oh my gosh, I’m back!”

Then, she panicked and said,

“I have to go to the imperial ball and meet His Majesty!”

‘What nonsense is that? I’m starting to wonder what happened to my mother’s head.’>
